member.name: ID3D11BlendState1.GetDesc1
member.summary: Gets the description for blending state that you used to create the blend-state object.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the blend state. This blend state can specify logical operations as well as blending operations.

member.name: ID3D11BlendState1
member.summary: The blend-state interface holds a description for blending state that you can bind to the output-merger stage. This blend-state interface supports logical operations as well as blending operations.
